original_text: Which was the son of Simeon, which was the son of Juda, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Jonan, which was the son of Eliakim,
korean_text: 그 위는 시므온이요 그 위는 유다요 그 위는 요셉이요 그 위는 요남이요 그 위는 엘리아김이요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Simeon
which was the son of Juda
which was the son of Joseph
which was the son of Jonan
which was the son of Eliakim
